00040 /**
00041  * @file
00042  *
00043  * <hr>$Revision: 0 $<hr>
00044  */
00045 
00046 #ifndef __CVMX_HELPER_PKO3_H__
00047 #define __CVMX_HELPER_PKO3_H__
00048 
00049 #ifdef  __cplusplus
00050 /* *INDENT-OFF* */
00051 extern "C" {
00052 /* *INDENT-ON* */
00053 #endif
00054 
00055 /*
00056  * Initialize PKO3 unit on the current node.
00057  *
00058  * Covers the common hardware, memory and global configuration.
00059  * Per-interface intialization is performed separately.
00060  *
00061  * @return 0 on success.
00062  *
00063  */
00064 extern int cvmx_helper_pko3_init_global(unsigned int node);
00065 int __cvmx_helper_pko3_init_global(unsigned int node, uint16_t gaura);
00066 
00067 /** 
00068  * Initialize a simple interface with a a given number of
00069  * fair or prioritized queues.
00070  * This function will assign one channel per sub-interface.
00071  */
00072 int __cvmx_pko3_config_gen_interface(int xiface, uint8_t subif,
00073                      uint8_t num_queues, bool prioritized);
00074 
00075 /*
00076  * Configure and initialize PKO3 for an interface
00077  *
00078  * @param interface is the interface number to configure
00079  * @return 0 on success.
00080  *
00081  */
00082 int cvmx_helper_pko3_init_interface(int xiface);
00083 int __cvmx_pko3_helper_dqs_activate(int xiface, int index, bool min_pad);
00084 
00085 /**
00086  * Uninitialize PKO3 interface
00087  *
00088  * Release all resources held by PKO for an interface.
00089  * The shutdown code is the same for all supported interfaces.
00090  */
00091 extern int cvmx_helper_pko3_shut_interface(int xiface);
00092 
00093 /**
00094  * Shutdown PKO3
00095  *
00096  * Should be called after all interfaces have been shut down on the PKO3.
00097  *
00098  * Disables the PKO, frees all its buffers.
00099  */
00100 extern int cvmx_helper_pko3_shutdown(unsigned int node);
00101 
00102 /**
00103  * Show integrated PKO configuration.
00104  *
00105  * @param node     node number
00106  */
00107 int cvmx_helper_pko3_config_dump(unsigned int node);
00108 
00109 /**
00110  * Show integrated PKO statistics.
00111  *
00112  * @param node     node number
00113  */
00114 int cvmx_helper_pko3_stats_dump(unsigned int node);
00115 
00116 /**
00117  * Clear PKO statistics.
00118  *
00119  * @param node     node number
00120  */
00121 void cvmx_helper_pko3_stats_clear(unsigned int node);
00122 
00123 #ifdef  __cplusplus
00124 /* *INDENT-OFF* */
00125 }
00126 /* *INDENT-ON* */
00127 #endif
00128 #endif /* __CVMX_HELPER_PKO3_H__ */
